description: Goa is home to a string of uninterrupted golden sand beaches that propel many tourists all year round. A mini paradise located on the west coast of India, Goa is a fusion of Portuguese-Indian heritage, endless beaches, eclectic seafood and stellar nightlife. With its easy -going vibes, this little state makes you carefree and lets you take your time to enjoy the laid-back lifestyle.
name: Goa
